name: Enflow
desc: System that allows police departments to build documentation workflows that they can automatically fill out through keyword extraction on daily logs via LLMs

name: Traffic Simulation
desc: Traffic Simulation modeling 34th and Spruce St in Philadelphia and displaying the reduction in traffic violations caused by addition of speed bumps and traffic cameras

name: Highs and Lows
desc: A social media app to track the highs, lows, and ratings per day of you and your buddies. Inspired by a Hack4Impact tradition.

name: Squirrels without Morality
desc: Bringing Penn's favorite (and only) Cards against Humanity clone to the world wide web in both single player and multiplayer modes.

name: PennBTI
desc: An MBTI test built only with Penn-related questions + a matching feature (because what kind of founder would I be if I didn't try my hand at dating apps)

name: PRDucer
desc: Developed for the Wharton School's Executive MBA classes. A step-by-step LLM assisted walkthrough of creating a technically sound PRD that can be given to Cursor, Claude Code, or any other AI assisted tool.

name: Presidential Debate Data
desc: Using the transcript to analyze the lexical, tonal, and topical patterns of the first Presidential debate of 2024!

name: Analyzing Music
desc: A combination of some Soundcloud & Genius scraping and a bit of Textblob to analyze what each artist's audeince values!
